sentence: The  war  began  Oct.  7,  when  nearly  2,000  Hamas  militants  stormed  into  Israel,  killing  around  1,400  people  â€”  mostly  Israeli  civilians,  including  women  and  children.

Israel's  bombardment  and  attacks  on  the  Gaza  Strip  have  since  killed  more  than  9,000  people,  70%  of  whom  are  women  and  children,  according  to  Palestinian  health  officials  in  Gaza.
The  network's  journalists  have  been  targeted  or  killed  while  covering  the  Israeli-Palestinian  conflict.

In  recent  weeks,  dozens  of  family  members  of  Al  Jazeera's  staff  in  Gaza  have  been  killed  in  the  Israel-Hamas  war,  including  the  wife,  son,  daughter  and  grandchild  of  Gaza  correspondent  Wael  Dahdouh.
